markdown:
**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 187 4.0 **Prerequisites** [thief racket](/Rackets.aspx?ID=3); [Debilitating Strike](/Classes.aspx?ID=10) --- You carefully aim and gracefully deliver your debilitations. Add the following debilitations to the list you can choose from when you use Debilitating Strike.
  • **Debilitation** The target takes an additional 2d6 precision damage from your attacks.
  • **Debilitation** The target becomes flat-footed.
name: Precise Debilitations
